Short description: Report if polymorphism at the site >
Description: Report sites if the probability that there is a polymorphism                    at the site is greater than N.  Default: 0.0
The expected mutation rate or pairwise nucleotide diversity among the population under analysis.  This serves as the  single parameter to the Ewens Sampling Formula prior model
Sets the default ploidy for the analysis
Allow haplotype calls with contiguous embedded matches of up  to this length. Set N=-1 to disable clumping.
Exclude alignments from analysis if they have a mapping quality less than this value
Exclude alleles from analysis if their supporting base quality is less than this value
Count mismatches  if the base quality of the mismatch is >= INT
Exclude reads with more than the given fraction of mismatches
Require at least this fraction of observations supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in the in order to evaluate the position
Require at least this count of observations supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in order to evaluate the position.
Require at least this sum of quality of observations supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in order to evaluate the position.
Require at least this count of observations supporting an alternate allele within the total population in order to use the allele in analysis.
Require at least this coverage to process a site
Iterate no more than N times during genotyping step
Integrate no deeper than the Nth best genotype by likelihood when genotyping
Incorporate non-independence of reads by scaling successive observations by this factor during data likelihood calculations.
Detect interrupted repeats, build across sequence until it has entropy > N bitd per bp
Atleast these many bp of the total repeat length is required for the assembly of observations across repeats
